  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Visa Assistance & Travel Operations",
  "description": "R-Pro Group is a fast-growing startup committed to driving innovation and excellence across multiple industries, including travel, business consulting, and IT services. As a dynamic and forward-thinking organization, we seek dedicated professionals who are passionate about growth, teamwork, and value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Visa Assistance &amp; Travel Operations

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah / Sangotedo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Schedule: Mondays to Fridays (On-site)

Job Summary


	We are seeking dedicated and skilled individuals to join our team as Travel Operations Associates.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with 1 year of work experience.&nbsp;
	Must reside around the Ajah axis.


Required Skills:


	Visa Assistance Services&nbsp;
	Flight Bookings and Reservations&nbsp;
	Sales and Marketing&nbsp;
	Microsoft Office Proficiency&nbsp;
	Email Writing Skills
	Customer Service&nbsp;
	Research Work.


Compensation


	Starting Salary: N80,000 per month.&nbsp;
	10% Commission on Sales
	Health Insurance (HMO)
	Bonuses
	Annual Leave.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to:&nbsp;careers@rprogroup.netusing the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Visa Assistance & Travel Operations Job at R-Pro Group




        
    

        
        R-Pro Group is a fast-growing startup committed to driving innovation and excellence across multiple industries, including travel, business consulting, and IT services. As a dynamic and forward-thinking organization, we seek dedicated professionals who are passionate about growth, teamwork, and value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Visa Assistance & Travel Operations

Job Location: Ajah / Sangotedo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Schedule: Mondays to Fridays (On-site)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking dedicated and skilled individuals to join our team as Travel Operations Associates.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 1 year of work experience. 
	Must reside around the Ajah axis.


Required Skills:


	Visa Assistance Services 
	Flight Bookings and Reservations 
	Sales and Marketing 
	Microsoft Office Proficiency 
	Email Writing Skills
	Customer Service 
	Research Work.


Compensation


	Starting Salary: N80,000 per month. 
	10% Commission on Sales
	Health Insurance (HMO)
	Bonuses
	Annual Leave.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: careers@rprogroup.netusing the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketing Executive",
  "description": "The Startup Place Limited is a Business Consulting firm with key focus on Startup Development, Digital Marketing and Business Growth. We pull a team of passionate entrepreneurs and consultant about helping you start, grow and scale your business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Role Description


	This is a full-time on-site role for a Marketing Executive, located in Lagos.
	The Marketing Executive will be responsible for market planning, conducting market research, and developing marketing strategies.
	Day-to-day tasks include communicating with clients, managing sales activities, and executing marketing campaigns.
	The role requires a proactive approach to drive business growth and achieve company objectives.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
	Experience in Sales activities
	Experience in a consulting or startup environment is a plus.
	Skills in Market Planning and Market Research
	Strong Communication and Marketing abilities
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Remuneration


	N200,000 / Month plus commission on sales.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should&nbsp;send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@thestartupplaceng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  },

Marketing Executive Job at the Startup Place Limited




        
    

        
        The Startup Place Limited is a Business Consulting firm with key focus on Startup Development, Digital Marketing and Business Growth. We pull a team of passionate entrepreneurs and consultant about helping you start, grow and scale your business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Role Description
     

            
    




	This is a full-time on-site role for a Marketing Executive, located in Lagos.
	The Marketing Executive will be responsible for market planning, conducting market research, and developing marketing strategies.
	Day-to-day tasks include communicating with clients, managing sales activities, and executing marketing campaigns.
	The role requires a proactive approach to drive business growth and achieve company objectives.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
	Experience in Sales activities
	Experience in a consulting or startup environment is a plus.
	Skills in Market Planning and Market Research
	Strong Communication and Marketing abilities
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Remuneration


	N200,000 / Month plus commission on sales.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@thestartupplaceng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Multigate Payments Limited
content:
Multigate is a financial technology company focused on providing solutions that cut across payments acquisition, processing and remittance as well as treasury and cash management for domestic and international corporates.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Front-end Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a qualified Front-end developer to join our IT team.
	You will be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of our web applications.
	You should be able to translate our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.
	If you’re interested in creating a user-friendly environment by writing code and moving forward in your career, then this job is for you.
	We expect you to be a tech-savvy professional, who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design. Ultimately, you should be able to create a functional and attractive digital environment for our company, ensuring great user experience.


Responsibilities


	Use markup languages like HTML to create user-friendly web pages
	Optimize applications for maximum speed
	Design mobile-based features
	Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
	Get feedback from, and build solutions for, users and customers
	Help back-end developers with coding and troubleshooting
	Ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency
	Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies


Requirements


	Proven work experience as a Front-end developer
	Hands on experience with markup languages
	Experience with JavaScript, CSS and jQuery
	Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Redux.
	Familiarity with browser testing and debugging
	In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
	An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
	Excellent analytical and multitasking skills
	BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field


Benefits


	Pension Plan
	Competitive Salary
	Basic Health care
	Hybrid working structure


Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Backend Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Description


	We are looking for an experienced Back-end developer to join our IT team. You will be responsible for the server side of our web applications. If you have excellent programming skills and a passion for developing applications or improving existing ones, we would like to meet you.
	As a Back-end developer, you’ll work closely with our engineers to ensure system consistency and improve user experience.
	Ultimately, you should be able to develop and maintain functional and stable web applications to meet our company’s needs.


Responsibilities


	Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging
	Write clean code to develop functional web applications
	Troubleshoot and debug applications
	Perform UI tests to optimize performance
	Manage cutting-edge technologies to improve legacy applications
	Collaborate with Front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server side logic
	Gather and address technical and design requirements
	Provide training and support to internal teams
	Build reusable code and libraries for future use
	Liaise with developers, designers and system administrators to identify new features
	Follow emerging technologies


Requirements


	BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
	Proven work experience as a Back-end developer
	In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
	Hands on experience with programming languages like Java, Javascript
	Excellent analytical and time management skills
	Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude


Benefits


	Pension Plan
	Basic Health care
	Competitive Salary
	Hybrid working structure


Click here to apply online

 

3.) Quality Assurance Personnel

Job Location: Lagos
Employment type: Full-time

Job Summary


	This individual will be responsible for ensuring that our software products meet quality standards and specifications by developing and executing test cases and test scripts, conducting various types of testing, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve issues.
	The ideal candidate must be able to interpret and implement quality assurance standards and provide accurate and comprehensive feedback to stakeholders.


Duties / Responsibilities


	Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts to ensure that software products meet quality standards and specifications.
	Implement and monitor test scripts to assess functionality, reliability, performance, and quality of the service or product.
	Analyze and troubleshoot defects and issues, and work with the development team to resolve these issues
	Identify areas for process improvement and develop and implement solutions to improve the software development process.
	Recommend, implement, and monitor preventative and corrective actions to ensure that quality assurance standards are achieved.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers and product managers, to ensure that quality standards are met throughout the software development lifecycle.
	Compile and analyze statistical data and communicate test results and quality issues to stakeholders, including product managers, development teams, and business stakeholders.
	Ensure that user expectations are met during the testing process.
	Create and maintain test reports and metrics to track progress and communicate status to stakeholders.
	Draft quality assurance policies and procedures
	Investigate customer complaints and product issues.


Requirements


	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong computer skills and knowledge of QA databases and applications.
	Ability to work collaboratively as part of a team
	Strong attention to detail and ability to spot issues and errors
	Excellent time management skills and ability to prioritize tasks effectively.


Required skills:


	Minimum 3 years of work experience as a Quality Analyst or similar role
	Experience in quality inspection, auditing, and testing
	Experience in software testing and quality assurance
	Familiarity with databases and query languages, such as SQL
	Understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.


Click here to apply online    

    

        Click here to Apply

Sales & Marketing Executive Job at R-Pro Group




        
    

        
        R-Pro Group is a fast-growing startup committed to driving innovation and excellence across multiple industries, including travel, business consulting, and IT services. As a dynamic and forward-thinking organization, we seek dedicated professionals who are passionate about growth, teamwork, and value creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales & Marketing Executive

Job Location: Ajah, Sangotedo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time, Permanent, New grad

Job Description
     

            
    




	R-Pro Group, a conglomerate offering Travels, Study Abroad, Loans, IT Services, Consultancy & Development, seeks Sales & Marketing Officers for multiple Lagos locations.


Responsibilities


	Develop & implement sales/marketing strategies across diverse industries.
	Close sales & generate leads to drive revenue.
	Manage client relationships & ensure satisfaction.
	Collaborate with stakeholders to tailor marketing initiatives.
	Meet & exceed sales targets across various services.


Qualifications


	Minimum 1 year of sales & marketing experience.
	OND/HND/BSc in Marketing, Business Administration or related field.
	Proven sales & marketing campaign success.
	Excellent communication, negotiation & interpersonal skills.
	Adaptable marketing strategies across industries.
	Strong understanding of online & offline marketing channels.


Remuneration


	Salary: N80,000 per month
	Commission: 10% commission on the service charge of every successful sale.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter & resume to: careers@rprogroup.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
